title: Nonfiction can appeal to youngsters who appear to be nonreaders
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Entertainment - Today 
Children who appear to be nonreaders are often nonfiction readers. While fiction demands the sequential flow, factual books permit stop-and-...
